pocketsphinx_en.name: Default English
pocketsphinx_en.description: Default English model for PocketSphinx from models/en-us in https://github.com/cmusphinx/pocketsphinx. Downloaded in December 2017.

pocketsphinx_de.name: German Voxforge 2017
pocketsphinx_de.description: Downloaded from https://sourceforge.net/projects/cmusphinx/files/Acoustic%20and%20Language%20Models/German/ in December 2017. Models were produced by Guenter Bartsch <guenter@zamia.org> and licensed under LGPLv3.
